p: CytoVeris Inc. is changing the paradigm in cancer surgery through the introduction of optical based =E2=80=9Cguided surgical tools=E2=80=9D. CytoVeris is working at the convergence of optical science, cancer biology, artificial intelligence and machine learning and translating that convergence to clinical application. We use multi-spectral light analysis, coupled with Artificial Intelligence, to provide an optical =E2=80=9Cfingerprint=E2=80=9D of tissue.
